entities.description: An item listed in the survey, referencing a specific crime or violation.
The unweighted number of occurrences of a specific survey item.
The percentage of occurrences of a specific survey item relative to the total survey responses.

relationships.description: Indicates that the survey contains a specific crime or violation.
Relates a survey item to its unweighted count of occurrences.
Indicates the percentage representation of the survey item in the dataset.
